com.tomzhu.tree

Class BinaryTree<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.tree.BinaryTree<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of element
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tree

    public class BinaryTree<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tree
    simple binary tree implementation
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BinaryTree(BinaryTreeNode<E> root)
      create a binaryTree using specific root.
      BinaryTree(E value)
      create a binaryTree using specific value as the root node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinaryTreeNode<E> addLeftChild(BinaryTreeNode<E> node, BinaryTreeNode<E> leftChild)
      add the leftChild node to the current node as its left child.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> addLeftChild(BinaryTreeNode<E> node, E value)
      add the left child using specific value to the current node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> addRightChild(BinaryTreeNode<E> node, BinaryTreeNode<E> rightChild)
      add the rightChild node to the current node as its right child and return the added node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> addRightChild(BinaryTreeNode<E> node, E value)
      add the right child using specific value to the current node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> clearChildren(BinaryTreeNode<E> node)
      remove the children node of the current node and then return the current node.

      boolean isRoot(BinaryTreeNode<E> node)

      remove and return the left child of current node.
      BinaryTreeNode<E> removeRightChild(BinaryTreeNode<E> node)
      remove and return the right child of current node return null if current node doesn't have right child.
